snippet: Latvia is joining Lithuania in banning Russian state television broadcasts because it found that several programs about the Ukraine crisis were tendentious and not in its national security interests.
lead_paragraph: Latvia is joining Lithuania in banning Russian state television broadcasts because it found that several programs about the Ukraine crisis were tendentious and not in its national security interests.

headline.main: Latvia: Ukraine Crisis Prompts Ban on Russian TV Broadcasts
headline.print_headline: Latvia: Ukraine Crisis Prompts Ban on Russian TV Broadcasts
